original_text: But when he who had set me apart before I was born, and who called me by his grace,
korean_text: 그러나 내 어머니의 태로부터 나를 택정하시고 그의 은혜로 나를 부르신 이가

sentences.original_text: But when he who had set me apart before I was born
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 태어나기 전에 나를 구별하셨던 그분께서

sentences.original_text: and who called me by his grace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 은혜로 나를 부르셨을 때
